name: Party Animal (Pilot)
description:
A cohort of the dead
seeks mortal
companionship...

Party Animal is a short puzzle experience stylized after classic and silent films. The game follows a ghost at a party who attempts to befriend another special guest: an intruding cat. Sneak up on the cat and catch it - sometimes with help from an unwitting guest or two.

Party Animal was created for the 40th GameMaker Community Jam. Special thanks to members of the Crimson Guild (Red Team) for their support during the jam.

An extended version is currently in development.
